thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 7 of 3524
thread.title: janice

author: janice
title: janice
text:
I bought 3 cryptogram books. they were rated as being in "good" condition, I believe. I assumed the "good" rating related to the book exterior only. They would probably be a little shop-worn looking. I was somewhat surprised to see that some of the puzzles had already been completed by a previous owner.
The books arrived when promised and well packaged. I was even able to get a small refund after-the-fact because I had forgotten to apply a discount code to my order. Customer service gave me a credit.
